product.feature2: Advanced dual-camera system with 12MP Wide and Ultra Wide cameras; Photographic Styles

product.productname: LG - 25.1 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator with Ice Maker - Stainless Steel
product.feature1: Stock-up and store everything you need. With a cavernous 25 cubic feet of space.
product.feature2: Get the space you need in a refrigerator that's right for your kitchen
product.feature3: Fingerprint and smudge resistant finish easily wipes clean with a soft, dry cloth, so the only lasting impression is your impeccable taste.

product.productname: LG - 27.8 Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with Smart Cooling System - Stainless Steel

product.productname: Garmin - Forerunner 965 GPS Smartwatch 47 mm Fiber-reinforced polymer - Carbon Gray TLC/Titanium
product.feature1: Brilliant AMOLED touchscreen display with traditional button controls and lightweight titanium bezel
product.feature2: Battery life: up to 23 days of battery life in smartwatch mode, up to 31 hours in GPS mode
product.feature3: Confidently run any route using full-color, built-in maps and multi-band GPS
product.feature4: Training readiness score is based on sleep quality, recovery, training load and HRV status to determine if you’re primed to go hard and reap the rewards

product.productname: Garmin - Instinct 2 Solar 45 mm Smartwatch Fiber-reinforced Polymer - Graphite
product.feature1: Go longer than ever with solar charging that gives you unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode
product.feature2: Rugged GPS smartwatch is water-rated to 100 meters and thermal- and shock resistant
product.feature3: Built-in sports apps to take on running, biking, swimming, strength training and more; plus, VO2 Max and other training features
product.feature4: Live the ultimate connected life with smart notifications and Connect IQ compatibility when paired with your compatible smartphone.
